source_text: Two granted mining leases and exploration licences, covering a total area of 179.59 km² in the Gascoyne province, approximately 220 km northwest of Meekatharra
additional_details: The coverage area is specifically for the Mt Egerton project's granted mining leases and exploration licences. The area was originally stated in km² and converted to hectares (1 km² = 100 hectares).
